name: XorOnlyTest
description: Unit tests for the XorOnlyAttribute class, covering encoding, decoding, equality, data length, and name retrieval.

test_cases.name: testDecodeAttributeBody
test_cases.description: Tests that no exceptions are thrown when calling the decodeAttributeBody method.

test_cases.name: testEncode
test_cases.description: Tests the encoding of XorOnly attributes.

test_cases.name: testEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equality method of XorOnlyAttribute for both positive and negative cases.

test_cases.name: testGetDataLength
test_cases.description: Tests that the data length returned by XorOnlyAttribute is 0.

test_cases.name: testGetName
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of the name of the XorOnlyAttribute.
